Study Hall Live Radio

Study Hall Live Radio

Study Hall Live Radio brings together leading voices in sustainability,
produced by Slow Factory and hosted by Céline Semaan

Spotify   Apple Podcasts

Episode 3

Sustainability: How do we Properly Report on it?

Special thanks to WDI NY for supporting this episode!



— Sustainability: How do we Properly Report on it?

Featuring:

Ash Owens Editor in Chief, Suited Magazine

Erin Allweiss Cofounder, The Number 29 Communications

Sarah Jane Spellings Journalist, New York Mag The Cut

William Defebaugh Editor in Chief, Atmos Magazine

Waste-Led Design

Listen to "Waste-Led Design".

Featuring:

Theanne Schiros Professor, FIT; Research Scientist, Columbia University; Co-founding Advisor, AlgiKnit

EPISODE 1

Sustainability in the Global South

Listen to "Sustainability in the Global South".

Good for the Earth,
Good for the People

Slow Factory Foundation is dedicated to improving sustainability literacy in fashion.

Using a holistic, human-centered approach, we bridge science, human rights, technology, fashion & culture to develop products, resources and certifications for industry and consumers alike.
